title: Linkin Park - Live in Las Vegas, 3-7-2008
description:
Another LPLive SBD release, night 2 in Sin City. Thanks to Valerie again for both Vegas shows.

Las Vegas, Nevada 
The Joint @ Hard Rock Hotel
7th March 2008 

Setlist:
01. What I&#039;ve Done
02. Faint
03. Somewhere I Belong
04. From The Inside
05. Points Of Authority
06. Hands Held High
07. Wake
08. Lying From You
09. Valentine&#039;s Day
10. Numb
11. Shadow Of The Day
12. Crawling
13. In The End
14. Bleed It Out
15. My December (Piano Version)
16. Breaking The Habit
17. A Place For My Head
18. One Step Closer 


Show Notes:
- There was nothing over &#039;Points Of Authority&#039;. Mike simply pumped up the crowd as he had a few times before. &#039;There They Go&#039; was over the outro. 
- Another shortened setlist, based off of Set T. The band added &#039;Shadow Of The Day&#039; back after the night before, where it was the first show the band has not played the song since the first Projekt Revolution 2007 show. &#039;Valentine&#039;s Day&#039; was added back also. &#039;Lying From You&#039; was moved down to go after &#039;Wake&#039; since it&#039;s been doing that the past few shows. &#039;Given Up&#039; and &#039;No More Sorrow&#039; are still missing. 
- On &#039;Bleed It Out&#039;, Brad starts off with the guitar part from the end, then Mike comes in under it and Chester does the chorus. The verse then follows. This also is the first time that the band does the singalong "Ohh ohh" part in a while.
